department.dept_long_name: Division of Engineering and Applied Sciences

course.title: Advanced Topics in Computer Architecture
course.description: Seminar course exploring recent research in computer architecture. Topics vary from year to year and will include subjects such as multi-core architectures, energy-efficient computing, reliable computing, and the interactions of these issues with system software. Students read and present research papers, undertake a research project.
course.prerequisites: Computer Science 146 or 246 or permission of the instructor.
